https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/wQtGQnr5RPnmzSfV9zUcgh8R9NX.jpg In an effort to prevent family history from repeating itself, meddlesome mom Daphne Wilder attempts to set up her youngest daughter, Milly, with Mr. Right. Meanwhile, her other daughters try to keep their mom's good intentions under control. Because I Said So
